title: nambithan irukirEn
sahitya:
nambittAn irukkirEn ennappanE jnAna naTarAjanE unnaruLaiyE



anupallavi



ambalattADum arashE un perumaiyai allum paghalum anbAi sholli sholli urugi 



caraNam



Anava mAya vinai arugi manakkal urugi mANikkavAcakar pOL

un mangaLa jYotiyil maraindu karaindu pOgha
